query:
ALTER TABLE defects 
ADD COLUMN type ENUM('CAR', 'PAR', 'NCR') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'CAR' AFTER resolutionComment,
ADD COLUMN checklistId INT AFTER type,
ADD COLUMN rootCause TEXT AFTER checklistId,
ADD COLUMN correctiveAction TEXT AFTER rootCause,
ADD COLUMN preventiveAction TEXT AFTER correctiveAction,
ADD COLUMN dueDate TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER preventiveAction,
ADD COLUMN ncrLevel ENUM('major', 'minor') NULL AFTER dueDate,
ADD COLUMN verifiedBy INT NULL AFTER ncrLevel,
ADD COLUMN verifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER verifiedBy,
ADD COLUMN verificationComment TEXT AFTER verifiedAt,
ADD INDEX typeIdx (type),
ADD INDEX checklistIdx (checklistId);

ADD COLUMN rootCause TEXT AFTER checklistId,
ADD COLUMN correctiveAction TEXT AFTER rootCause,
ADD COLUMN preventiveAction TEXT AFTER correctiveAction,
ADD COLUMN dueDate TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER preventiveAction,
ADD COLUMN ncrLevel ENUM('major', 'minor') NULL AFTER dueDate,
ADD COLUMN verifiedBy INT NULL AFTER ncrLevel,
ADD COLUMN verifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER verifiedBy,
ADD COLUMN verificationComment TEXT AFTER verifiedAt,
ADD INDEX typeIdx (type),
